content:
Hey all! @lcnr asked that for a repo for this project group, and we realized that there isn't even an official team for it. So I'm going to open a PR to create one. As far as membership, I was going to populate it with these people as a start:

  • @lcnr (lead)
  • @nikomatsakis (lead, as lang-team liaison)
  • @varkor
  • @davidtwco
  • @oli
  • @boats

The intent is to capture folks who've been actively hacking or doing design contribution. These folks will have write access to the repo. If I've overlooked anyone, or you feel you ought not to be included, feel free to ping me and @lcnr =) Don't be shy.
